3453.verse: مَن|Whoever|78|90|76$كَفَرَ|disbelieves,|96|120|950$فَعَلَيْهِ|then against him|130|154|8270$كُفْرُهُۥ‌ۖ|(is) his disbelief.|128|152|13753$وَمَنْ|And whoever|106|130|1012$عَمِلَ|does|66|78|10138$صَـٰلِحًا|righteousness,|116|181|622$فَلِأَنفُسِهِمْ|then for themselves|152|282|13754$يَمْهَدُونَ|they are preparing,|147|212|13755$

3454.verse: لِيَجْزِىَ|That He may reward|155|166|8017$ٱلَّذِينَ|those who|89|111|20$ءَامَنُواْ|believe|82|104|84$وَعَمِلُواْ|and do|92|114|238$ٱلصَّـٰلِحَـٰتِ|righteous deeds|125|147|239$مِن|(out) of|72|83|53$فَضْلِهِۦٓ‌ۚ|His Bounty.|95|120|866$إِنَّهُۥ|Indeed, He|92|142|396$لَا|(does) not|90|140|30$يُحِبُّ|like|68|118|1712$ٱلْكَـٰفِرِينَ|the disbelievers.|128|153|364$

3455.verse: وَمِنْ|And among|93|104|1133$ءَايَـٰتِهِۦٓ|His Signs|87|108|706$أَن|(is) that|75|96|655$يُرْسِلَ|He sends|80|101|10452$ٱلرِّيَاحَ|the winds|84|105|6467$مُبَشِّرَٲتٍ|(as) bearers of glad tidings|199|210|13756$وَلِيُذِيقَكُم|and to let you taste|154|162|13757$مِّن|of|50|65|53$رَّحْمَتِهِۦ|His Mercy,|98|113|6470$وَلِتَجْرِىَ|and that may sail|135|150|13758$ٱلْفُلْكُ|the ships|80|95|13759$بِأَمْرِهِۦ|at His Command,|131|139|1031$وَلِتَبْتَغُواْ|and that you may seek|173|187|9913$مِن|of|50|78|53$فَضْلِهِۦ|His Bounty,|95|124|866$وَلَعَلَّكُمْ|and that you may|138|166|1341$تَشْكُرُونَ|be grateful.|105|119|508$

3456.verse: وَلَقَدْ|And verily,|90|110|640$أَرْسَلْنَا|We sent|82|122|1342$مِن قَبْلِكَ|before you|102|142|47$رُسُلاً|Messengers|97|137|4654$إِلَىٰ|to|53|93|118$قَوْمِهِمْ|their people,|103|123|8244$فَجَآءُوهُم|and they came to them|176|187|8245$بِٱلْبَيِّنَـٰتِ|with clear proofs;|137|160|880$فَٱنتَقَمْنَا|then We took retribution|183|206|6763$مِنَ|from|50|72|156$ٱلَّذِينَ|those who|89|100|20$أَجْرَمُواْ‌ۖ|committed crimes.|141|150|6010$وَكَانَ|And it was|90|109|363$حَقًّا|incumbent|88|107|1566$عَلَيْنَا|upon Us|73|92|681$نَصْرُ|(to) help|78|97|13760$ٱلْمُؤْمِنِينَ|the believers.|110|120|1964$

3457.verse: ٱللَّهُ|Allah|53|69|123$ٱلَّذِى|(is) the One Who|134|166|138$يُرْسِلُ|sends|77|109|6466$ٱلرِّيَـٰحَ|the winds,|89|121|6467$فَتُثِيرُ|so they raise|106|138|13761$سَحَابًا|(the) clouds,|106|122|6472$فَيَبْسُطُهُۥ|then He spreads them|166|180|13762$فِى|in|48|75|89$ٱلسَّمَآءِ|the sky,|84|111|157$كَيْفَ|how|66|93|288$يَشَآءُ|He wills,|74|101|867$وَيَجْعَلُهُۥ|and He makes them|150|164|13763$كِسَفًا|fragments|86|97|10539$فَتَرَى|so you see|92|113|5040$ٱلْوَدْقَ|the rain|78|99|12605$يَخْرُجُ|coming forth|103|124|6479$مِنْ|from|50|71|53$خِلَـٰلِهِۦ‌ۖ|their midst.|95|116|12606$فَإِذَآ|Then when|93|104|1730$أَصَابَ بِهِۦ|He causes it to fall on|166|180|13764$مَن|whom|58|86|76$يَشَآءُ|He wills|69|98|867$مِنْ|of|50|78|53$عِبَادِهِۦٓ|His slaves,|90|118|868$إِذَا|behold!|68|96|1370$هُمْ|They|53|67|49$يَسْتَبْشِرُونَ|rejoice|125|125|3501$

3451.verse: Say, [O Muhammad], "Travel through the land and observe how was the end of those before. Most of them were associators [of others with Allah].

3452.verse: So direct your face toward the correct religion before a Day comes from Allah of which there is no repelling. That Day, they will be divided.

3453.verse: Whoever disbelieves - upon him is [the consequence of] his disbelief. And whoever does righteousness - they are for themselves preparing,

3454.verse: That He may reward those who have believed and done righteous deeds out of His bounty. Indeed, He does not like the disbelievers.

3455.verse: And of His signs is that He sends the winds as bringers of good tidings and to let you taste His mercy and so the ships may sail at His command and so you may seek of His bounty, and perhaps you will be grateful.

3456.verse: And We have already sent messengers before you to their peoples, and they came to them with clear evidences; then We took retribution from those who committed crimes, and incumbent upon Us was support of the believers.

3457.verse: It is Allah who sends the winds, and they stir the clouds and spread them in the sky however He wills, and He makes them fragments so you see the rain emerge from within them. And when He causes it to fall upon whom He wills of His servants, immediately they rejoice

3458.verse: Although they were, before it was sent down upon them - before that, in despair.

3459.verse: So observe the effects of the mercy of Allah - how He gives life to the earth after its lifelessness. Indeed, that [same one] will give life to the dead, and He is over all things competent.
